20101202070910.571|20101202070912.000|CCO|FOR THE REPEAL OF "DON'T ASK,
20101202070912.000|20101202070914.500|CCO|DON'T TELL," AND YESTERDAY THE
20101202070914.500|20101202070917.000|CCO|PENTAGON RELEASED A REPORT THAT
20101202070917.000|20101202070919.500|CCO|SAID ITS REPEAL WOULD HAVE NO
20101202070919.500|20101202070922.000|CCO|EFFECT ON MILITARY REDNESS.
20101202070922.000|20101202070924.500|CCO|BUT I QUESTION THE OBJECTIVE OF
20101202070924.500|20101202070927.000|CCO|THE STUDY'S AUTHOR, JAY JOHNSON
20101202070927.000|20101202070929.500|CCO|AND GENERAL CARTER HAMM, TWO
20101202070929.500|20101202070932.000|CCO|GOOD-LOOKING GUYS WITH SPENT THE
20101202070932.000|20101202070933.286|CCO|LAST YEAR TRAVELING THE WORLD
20101202070933.286|20101202070934.571|CCO|TOGETHER, ASKING FIT YOUNG
20101202070934.571|20101202070935.857|CCO|SOLDIERS THEIR FEELINGS ABOUT
20101202070935.857|20101202070937.143|CCO|HOMOSEXUALITY.
20101202070937.143|20101202070938.429|CCO|I'M NOT SAYING.
